value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|The...World of Origin?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|That's right. That's what this world
is called.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Why "origin"?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... Maybe it was the first world
unlocked by Askr—but the history of
the term isn't of interest to me.$k$pRight now the people here are
celebrating this world's first hero,
who was named Anri.$k$pCan you just imagine what Heroes
we might find here. Does that not
excite you?$k$pNo doubt the Order of Heroes
has noticed us and will try to
get in our way...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Askr, hm?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Is that a problem?$k$pWould you rather not fight Askr?
Call the whole thing off?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It's not that... They are our enemies.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Good! And you are correct—Askr
and Embla are enemies.$k$p...And the fighting will continue until
only one of them remains. Now come
along, Princess Veronica.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_幼少マリク,ch01_06_Marich_M_Before01,Face|I'm sorry, Prince Marth... If my magic
were stronger, it wo—$k$p$WmMPID_幼少マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Before01,Face|No need to worry, Merric.$k$p...Hello? Can I help you?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You...are young Prince Marth.$k$pYour fight has yet to begin... Your
parents yet live, and your country
yet flourishes.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Before01,Face|What do you know of Altea?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Soon it will be drawn into war.
But do not worry.$k$pWhen you grow up, you will
rule over everything...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Before01,Face|Wh-what?!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Perhaps I've said too much. Forget
I mentioned anything.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Ah! It seems the Order of Heroes
has arrived. Shall we greet them in
the customary fashion?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Tch. She's always making a mess
of things... This way, Prince Marth.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Before01,Face|Wait! Tell me more about what you
know of Altea...$k$p

$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|The princeling may have been
defeated, but we must press on.$k$pIt is only when saturated in defeat
that mortals show their true strength.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|...I was wondering when you might
make your appearance, Thórr. Been
observing from afar, as usual?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Am I to assume this was your doing,
then? It was you who gave these
children such immense power?$k$pHow like you to favor the small
and weak.$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|They may be small, but they are not
weak. They are true heroes, filled
with a strength of spirit.$k$p$EFace|They are destined for legend.$k$pNo doubt their power will grow when
their time comes, but...there is no
harm in drawing out their potential.$k$p...And you? Why are you here?
Up to your usual tricks?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Tricks? That hurts. I want only the
best for these people, just the
same as you.$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|I find that exceedingly unlikely. But
I will not interfere—if you stay out
of my way in kind.$k$p$Sbs150|
